title: Site Topics
author: Anton
body:
Stuff from my meeting with David.

The following are the things we want to work on:

  1. AI - modular, having memory, and capable of symbolic reasoning
  2. Geometry-based game design
  3. Cryptocurrency for the virtual world - Check out this interview with Elon Musk
  4. Neuroscience and neuroengineering
  5. Robotics - David loaned me a Yahboom G1 tank robot

Please let me know if you are intereseted in any of this stuff!
